phoenix.name: Phoenix
phoenix.description: Phoenix is a sunny oasis with an equally cheerful atmosphere. Explore Downtown Phoenix on foot to enjoy the warm weather and explore award-winning restaurants, lively nightlife and a charming historic district. Stop at Roosevelt Row to learn about the city’s burgeoning arts and music community.

new-york.name: New York
new-york.description: There are stacks of amazing things you can do when you visit a new place. So why not get your trip to New York off to a flying start by checking out some of our recommendations? After all – out there starts here!
